content:
TITLE: Basic usage of zero-vue with Vue and Zero database
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to initialize a Zero database instance and use the useQuery hook from zero-vue to query user data from the database.
SOURCE: https://github.com/danielroe/zero-vue/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import { Zero } from '@rocicorp/zero'
import { useQuery } from 'zero-vue'

// see docs: https://zero.rocicorp.dev/docs/introduction
const z = new Zero({
  userID,
  server: import.meta.env.VITE_PUBLIC_SERVER,
  schema,
  kvStore: 'mem',
})

const { data: users } = useQuery(z.query.user)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing zero-vue package with npm or pnpm
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the zero-vue package using either npm or pnpm package managers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/danielroe/zero-vue/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
# npm
npm install zero-vue

# pnpm
pnpm install zero-vue
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Project Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Commands to enable corepack and install project dependencies using pnpm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/danielroe/zero-vue/blob/main/playground/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
corepack enable
pnpm i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Docker Database
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the database service using Docker through pnpm script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/danielroe/zero-vue/blob/main/playground/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
pnpm dev:db-up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Zero Cache Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the zero cache server through pnpm script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/danielroe/zero-vue/blob/main/playground/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
pnpm dev:zero-cache
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Vite Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Vite development server for the UI through pnpm script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/danielroe/zero-vue/blob/main/playground/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
pnpm dev:ui
```
